metadata.title: CVE-2024-47751 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:PCI: kirin: Fix buffer overflow in kirin_pcie_parse_port()Within kirin_pcie_parse_port(), the pcie->num_slots is compared topcie->gpio_id_reset size (MAX_PCI_SLOTS) which is correct and would leadto an overflow.Thus, fix condition to pcie->num_slots + 1 >= MAX_PCI_SLOTS and movepcie->num_slots increment below the if-statement to avoid out-of-boundsarray access.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.[kwilczynski: commit log]

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
